input.sentences: while cleaning my parents ' house i found old pictures from my dad 's hiking days .
dad hiked all throughout the location location location in the summer of 1975 .
here he is with his hiking buddies on the top of a peak .
they pitched a tent every night on the trail and made their own campfires .
i took this picture of one of the peaks he summited on my last trip out west .
output.sentences: My sisters wanted to go camping on their own.
It was summer so they hiked to a high spot above the campgrounds.
When they arrive at the peak, they noticed that their boyfriends had followed them
The boys had also decided to go camping and this could be a problem.
So my sisters headed west and summited another mountain and pitched their tent there.
